wadl:resource_type.wadl:doc: The root of the web service.
A collection of bugs, as exposed through the web service.

wadl:param.name: ws_op
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The name of the operation being invoked.

wadl:param.name: display_name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Display Name: This team's name as you would like it displayed throughout Launchpad.

wadl:param.name: name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Name: A short unique name, beginning with a lower-case letter or number, and containing only letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, or plus signs.

wadl:param.name: default_membership_period
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Subscription period: Number of days a new subscription lasts before expiring. You can customize the length of an individual subscription when approving it. Leave this empty or set to 0 for subscriptions to never expire.

wadl:param.name: team_description
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team Description: Use plain text; URLs will be linkified

wadl:param.name: default_renewal_period
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Renewal period: Number of days a subscription lasts after being renewed. You can customize the lengths of individual renewals, but this is what's used for auto-renewed and user-renewed memberships.

wadl:param.name: subscription_policy
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Subscription policy

wadl:param.name: ws_op
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The name of the operation being invoked.

wadl:param.name: text
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Search text

wadl:param.name: status
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The state of this membership

wadl:param.name: person
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Member

wadl:param.name: team
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team

wadl:param.name: team
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team

wadl:param.name: team
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team

wadl:param.name: team
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team

wadl:param.name: status
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The state of this membership

wadl:param.name: mugshot_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Mugshot: A large image of exactly 192x192 pixels, that will be displayed on the team page in Launchpad. It should be no bigger than 100kb in size.

wadl:param.name: jabberids_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of Jabber IDs of this Person.

wadl:param.name: allwikis_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All WikiNames of this Person.

wadl:param.name: renewal_policy
wadl:param.wadl:doc: When someone's membership is about to expire, notify them and

wadl:option.value: invite them to apply for renewal
invite them to renew their own membership
renew their membership automatically, also notifying the admins

wadl:param.name: teams_participated_in_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All teams in which this person is a participant.

wadl:param.name: timezone
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Timezone: The timezone of where you live.

wadl:param.name: subscriptionpolicy
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Subscription policy: 'Moderated' means all subscriptions must be approved. 'Open' means any user can join without approval. 'Restricted' means new members can be added only by a team administrator.

wadl:param.name: displayname
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Display Name: This team's name as you would like it displayed throughout Launchpad.

wadl:param.name: preferredemail_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Preferred email address: The preferred email address for this person. The one we'll use to communicate with them.

wadl:param.name: teams_indirectly_participated_in_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All teams in which this person is an indirect member.

wadl:param.name: validatedemails_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Confirmed e-mails of this person.: Confirmed e-mails are the ones in the VALIDATED state

wadl:param.name: languages_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of languages known by this person

wadl:param.name: expiredmembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the EXPIRED state

wadl:param.name: allmembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All participants of this team.: List of all direct and indirect people and teams who, one way or another, are a part of this team. If you want a method to check if a given person is a member of a team, you should probably look at IPerson.inTeam().

wadl:param.name: is_valid_person_or_team
wadl:param.wadl:doc: This is an active user or a team.

wadl:param.name: teamowner
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team Owner

wadl:param.name: member_memberships_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Active `ITeamMembership`s for this object's members.: Active TeamMemberships are the ones with the ADMIN or APPROVED status. The results are ordered using Person.sortingColumns.

wadl:param.name: is_team
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Is this object a team?

wadl:param.name: mailing_list_auto_subscribe_policy
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Mailing List Auto-subscription Policy: This attribute determines whether a person is automatically subscribed to a team's mailing list when the person joins said team.

wadl:option.value: Ask me when I join a team
Always subscribe me to mailing lists

wadl:param.name: defaultmembershipperiod
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Subscription period: Number of days a new subscription lasts before expiring. You can customize the length of an individual subscription when approving it. Leave this empty or set to 0 for subscriptions to never expire.

wadl:param.name: myactivememberships_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All `ITeamMembership`s for Teams this Person is an active member of.

wadl:param.name: hide_email_addresses
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Hide my email addresses from other Launchpad users

wadl:param.name: visibility
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Visibility: Public visibility is standard, and Private Membership means that a team's members are hidden.

wadl:param.name: defaultrenewalperiod
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Renewal period: Number of days a subscription lasts after being renewed. You can customize the lengths of individual renewals, but this is what's used for auto-renewed and user-renewed memberships.

wadl:param.name: invited_members_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the INVITED state

wadl:param.name: datecreated
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Created

wadl:param.name: teamdescription
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Team Description: Use plain text; URLs will be linkified

wadl:param.name: name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Name: A short unique name, beginning with a lower-case letter or number, and containing only letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, or plus signs.

wadl:param.name: proposedmembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the PROPOSED state

wadl:param.name: adminmembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of this team's admins.

wadl:param.name: ircnicknames_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of IRC nicknames of this Person.

wadl:param.name: karma
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Karma: The cached total karma for this person.

wadl:param.name: open_membership_invitations_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Open membership invitations.: All TeamMemberships which represent an invitation (to join a team) sent to this person.

wadl:param.name: deactivatedmembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the DEACTIVATED state

wadl:param.name: homepage_content
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Homepage Content: The content of your home page. Edit this and it will be displayed for all the world to see.

wadl:param.name: activemembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of members with ADMIN or APPROVED status

wadl:param.name: mugshot_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Mugshot: A large image of exactly 192x192 pixels, that will be displayed on the team page in Launchpad. It should be no bigger than 100kb in size.

wadl:param.name: renewal_policy
wadl:param.wadl:doc: When someone's membership is about to expire, notify them and

wadl:option.value: invite them to apply for renewal
invite them to renew their own membership
renew their membership automatically, also notifying the admins

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Subscription policy: 'Moderated' means all subscriptions must be approved. 'Open' means any user can join without approval. 'Restricted' means new members can be added only by a team administrator.

wadl:method.name: POST
wadl:method.wadl:doc:
An operation that modifies a bug task's status.

XXX leonardr 2008-04-01 bug=210265: To implement this without creating a custom operation, call transitionToStatus() when the client writes to the bug task's 'status' attribute.

wadl:param.name: status
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Status

wadl:param.name: date_closed
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Closed: The date on which this task was marked either Fix Committed or Fix Released.

wadl:param.name: bug_target_name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The target as presented in mail notifications

wadl:param.name: date_confirmed
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Confirmed: The date on which this task was marked Confirmed.

wadl:param.name: related_tasks_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Other tasks on the same bug.

wadl:param.name: importance
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Importance

wadl:param.name: title
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The title of the bug related to this bugtask

wadl:param.name: status_explanation
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Status notes (optional)

wadl:param.name: is_complete
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Is all the work required on this bug task complete?

wadl:param.name: bug_target_display_name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The short, descriptive name of the target

wadl:param.name: date_created
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Created: The date on which this task was created.

wadl:param.name: date_assigned
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Assigned: The date on which this task was assigned to someone.

wadl:param.name: date_inprogress
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date In Progress: The date on which this task was marked In Progress.

wadl:param.name: status
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Status

wadl:param.name: date_closed
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Closed: The date on which this task was marked either Fix Committed or Fix Released.

wadl:param.name: date_confirmed
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Confirmed: The date on which this task was marked Confirmed.

wadl:param.name: importance
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Importance

wadl:param.name: status_explanation
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Status notes (optional)

wadl:param.name: is_complete
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Is all the work required on this bug task complete?

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Created: The date on which this task was created.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Assigned: The date on which this task was assigned to someone.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date In Progress: The date on which this task was marked In Progress.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Display Name: Your name as you would like it displayed throughout Launchpad. Most people use their full name here.

wadl:param.name: preferredemail_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Preferred email address: The preferred email address for this person. The one we'll use to communicate with them.

wadl:param.name: teams_indirectly_participated_in_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All teams in which this person is an indirect member.

wadl:param.name: validatedemails_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Confirmed e-mails of this person.: Confirmed e-mails are the ones in the VALIDATED state

wadl:param.name: languages_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of languages known by this person

wadl:param.name: hide_email_addresses

wadl:param.name: allmembers_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: All participants of this team.: List of all direct and indirect people and teams who, one way or another, are a part of this team. If you want a method to check if a given person is a member of a team, you should probably look at IPerson.inTeam().

wadl:param.wadl:doc: This is an active user or a team.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Active `ITeamMembership`s for this object's members.: Active TeamMemberships are the ones with the ADMIN or APPROVED status. The results are ordered using Person.sortingColumns.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Is this object a team?

wadl:param.name: mailing_list_auto_subscribe_policy
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Mailing List Auto-subscription Policy: This attribute determines whether a person is automatically subscribed to a team's mailing list when the person joins said team.

wadl:option.value: Ask me when I join a team
Always subscribe me to mailing lists

wadl:param.wadl:doc: All `ITeamMembership`s for Teams this Person is an active member of.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the EXPIRED state

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Visibility: Public visibility is standard, and Private Membership means that a team's members are hidden.

wadl:param.name: mugshot_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Mugshot: A large image of exactly 192x192 pixels, that will be displayed on your home page in Launchpad. Traditionally this is a great big picture of your grinning face. Make the most of it! It should be no bigger than 100kb in size.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the PROPOSED state

wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of this team's admins.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of IRC nicknames of this Person.

wadl:param.name: karma
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Karma: The cached total karma for this person.

wadl:param.name: open_membership_invitations_collection_link
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Open membership invitations.: All TeamMemberships which represent an invitation (to join a team) sent to this person.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: All members whose membership is in the DEACTIVATED state

wadl:param.wadl:doc: List of members with ADMIN or APPROVED status

wadl:param.wadl:doc: Display Name: Your name as you would like it displayed throughout Launchpad. Most people use their full name here.

wadl:resource_type.wadl:doc: A bug, as exposed through the web service.

wadl:param.name: security_related
wadl:param.wadl:doc: This bug is a security vulnerability

wadl:param.name: is_complete
wadl:param.wadl:doc: This bug is complete.: A bug is Launchpad is completely addressed when there are no tasks that are still open for the bug.

wadl:param.name: tags
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Tags: Separated by whitespace.

wadl:param.name: title
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Summary: A one-line summary of the problem.

wadl:param.name: date_last_updated
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Last Updated

wadl:param.name: private
wadl:param.wadl:doc: This bug report should be private: Private bug reports are visible only to their subscribers.

wadl:param.name: name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Nickname: A short and unique name. Add one only if you often need to retype the URL but have trouble remembering the bug number.

wadl:param.name: date_made_private
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Made Private

wadl:param.name: permits_expiration
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Does the bug's state permit expiration? Expiration is permitted when the bug is not valid anywhere, a message was sent to the bug reporter, and the bug is associated with pillars that have enabled bug expiration.

wadl:param.name: followup_subject
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The likely subject of the next message.

wadl:param.name: can_expire
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Can the Incomplete bug expire if it becomes inactive? Expiration may happen when the bug permits expiration, and a bugtask cannot be confirmed.

wadl:param.name: datecreated
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Created

wadl:param.name: id
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Bug ID

wadl:param.name: date_last_message
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date of last bug message

wadl:param.name: description
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Description: A detailed description of the problem, including the steps required to reproduce it.

wadl:param.name: security_related
wadl:param.wadl:doc: This bug is a security vulnerability

wadl:param.name: tags
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Tags: Separated by whitespace.

wadl:param.name: title
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Summary: A one-line summary of the problem.

wadl:param.name: private
wadl:param.wadl:doc: This bug report should be private: Private bug reports are visible only to their subscribers.

wadl:param.name: name
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Nickname: A short and unique name. Add one only if you often need to retype the URL but have trouble remembering the bug number.

wadl:param.name: date_made_private
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Date Made Private

wadl:param.name: followup_subject
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The likely subject of the next message.

wadl:param.name: description
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Description: A detailed description of the problem, including the steps required to reproduce it.
